Name: TANKS
About the game: TANKS is a fun game for one or two players. Play alone or play in cooperation with a friend on the same screen. Your goal is to destroy all enemy tanks while protecting your base. Gameplay includes wall destruction. Use it to achieve tactical superiority over enemies, to flank them, to destroy. There are different types of enemy tanks with different characteristics. Power-ups and other stuff are available after killing certain enemies. For more fun play in coop, compete, help each other. Use built-in level editor to create your own levels! Supports XBox and compatible XInput controllers.
